_sText:
Hunger Games
==================
	This is a new mod called hunger games, where you have to fight for your life finding boxes to get weapons and kill your enemies.

Game Instructions
------------------
You start in a cage where you have 30 seconds to plan what you are going to do, you dont start with any weapons so you gotta find boxes to get weapons, every box has a random spawned weapon, except for those in the middle.
Scavenge around the map and watch out for enemies. The last person alive shall become the victor!

Whats new?
------------------
Optimizing was a big part of the final version, so thats what we did, the castle has been recreated, so people may have higher fps near the castle.

We also fixed some textures

New Project
==================
[HG_Stranded](http://gamebanana.com/projects/34709 "HG_Stranded")

> [Hunger Games Beta TRAILER](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-JBKjFgS4cg&feature=youtu.be "Hunger Games Beta TRAILER")
